title: Update Agent/Agency Import Log Template
custom_steps:
* AC:
** When a user selects the â€œDownload Templateâ€� button, the template attached is the file that will download
** This file should replace the current Agent-Agency Template that is there

title: Update Agent/Agency Import Log Accepted Format
custom_steps:
Business Value: Match the format that the MLBPA is sending us

AC:

* The user will upload a file with the following columns:
** UID
** PeopleID
** first_name*
** last_name*
** PeopleLeagalName*
** OrganizationName*
** PersonType
** Address Type
** StreetAddress1
** StreetAddress2
** StreetAddress3
** City
** State
** PostalCode
** Country
** Work Phone*
** Cellular Phone*
** Fax Number*
** Email
** Certification Date
** Last Designation Date
* The column labels with asterisks* will be required fields 
* At least one, but not all are required between: Work Phone, Cellular Phone, and Fax Number
* When the UID column is not filled in, that will trigger the process of creating a new agent following a successful upload.

title: As a User, I want to Create a New Employee from the Elig for Dugout utility
custom_steps:
AC:

* There will be a â€˜Create New Employeeâ€™ button added to the Elig for Dugout utility
* Clicking the button will open a modal:
** Title: Reminder
** Body: Creating a new employee will not add them to your Organization.  You will need to create a subsequent Assign/Reassign Employee transaction for them be added to your Organization and to be available for the Eligible for Dugout list.
** Buttons: Continue
* Clicking the Continue button will load a new blank employee profile in edit mode: [https://ebis.mlb.com/ebisui/#/pro-player-profile/info?newType=3|https://ebis.mlb.com/ebisui/#/pro-player-profile/info?newType=3|smart-link] 
* When the user completes and saves the profile, they will stay on the profile and be able to access the Create New button

title: MN Insurance should have a COBRA subsidy field added to the JSON payload
custom_steps:
BCC has requested we add a COBRA subsidy field to the JSON payload they receive from the mn insurance batch. The new field should be included in the events list, and will be populated according to the following criteria:

* 0 months of coverage: The player declared free agency, voluntarily retired, opt-out of contract, requested release to sign with a foreign club, or abandoned their position.
* 2 months of coverage: Player is involuntarily terminated during the off-season.
* 3 months of coverage: Player is involuntarily terminated during Spring Training or the Championship Season

title: As a BOC Admin, I want to see a new Player Type filter on the Addendum C widget
custom_steps:
AC

* There will be a new â€˜Player Typeâ€™ filter under the filter icon in the Addendum C widget
* Options in this filter will match the potential values in the Player Type column
* The type will default to the Non-system generated 
* Applying this filter will filter the values displayed in the widget, as expected
* By default, the widget will display all player types

{{Default the type to the non generated types (also include Needs MNC in the type list) update the status filter to only include the pre approved statuses Remove any filtering on status or type from the view, return all types}}

title: As a MNC Admin, I want to Override a Spring Training salary on the MN Payroll Utility
custom_steps:
Business Value: Currently, players can either be Reported or Not Reported to the spring training period.  However, there are certain players that should not be paid at all when assigned to Major League Spring Training.  Clubs need a way to handle these scenarios.



AC:

* When viewing the Breakdown section of the MN Payroll Utility *for the Spring Training period*, there will be a new â€˜Overridesâ€™ button in the footer
* Clicking the â€œOverridesâ€� button will open a modal that looks very similar to the â€˜Update Datesâ€™ modal
** The title will read â€œOverridesâ€�
** Report Date will be replaced with Start Date
** There will be an Amount filed/column immediately to the right of End Date
** The trash can icon will remain
** Update button will be replace with Save
* Saving an override will adjust the Amounts in the breakdown for the dates entered
* If an override is in place, there will be a visual indicator in the Amount field for the dates that are being overwritten
* Overrides may be deleted and the Amount fields will revert back to the expected values



Note:  for now, overrides will be limited to Spring Training, however this may be expanded in the future

title: As a BOC Admin, I want to filter Active/Inactive CSP/CEP Schools
custom_steps:
Note: This filter will work the same as the R4 Schools widget

AC:

* When viewing the CSP/CEP Schools widget, there will be a new header filter for school status
* Option in this filter will be:
** Active
** Inactive
** Active & Inactive
* The filter will default to Active, and only show Active Schools
* When setting the filter to Inactive, only Inactive schools will be displayed
* Setting the filter to Active & Inactive will display all CSP/CEP school, regardless of status

title: As a BOC Admin, I want to set a CSP/CEP School as Inactive
custom_steps:
Context: If a school stops operating or no longer qualifies for our CEP/CSP program, players should no longer be able to submit invoices for them.



AC:

* When viewing a CSP/CEP School profile, there will be an â€œActiveâ€� checkbox
* This box will be checked by default
* Unchecking this box will remove the school from the CEP/CSP School dropdowns on Invoices
* Marking an school as inactive will not impact any already created invoices

title: As an Reg Admin, I want to save a Level 2 Investigation as Preliminary
custom_steps:
Business Context: When completing a Level 2 Investigation in ebis, there's no submit button, just save.Â  When save is clicked, the investigation is submitted to LARI, whether complete or not.

AC:

* There will be a Submit button added to the Level 2 Investigation form
* Clicking Save, will no longer submit the investigation to LARI
* Clicking Save on an unsubmitted form will save the form and set the status to Preliminary
* Clicking Submit will prompt the user to confirm their action:
** Header: Are you sure?
** Body: This action will submit the investigation to LARI.  Do you wish to continue?
** Buttons: Continue, Back
* Submitting will send the investigation to LARI and update the status to Pending
